short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hide all mentions of your haters

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Hate someone? Don't wanna see his/her name or picture? Just use HaterBlock!!! 
A chrome extension allows users to block every text occurrence and blur every picture of the HATER they input!
